text: Nocardiopsis quinghaiensis is a Gram-positive and aerobic bacterium from the genus of Nocardiopsis which has been isolated from alkaline soil in Qaidam Basin in China.UniProtDeutsche Sammlung von Mikroorganismen und Zellkulturen == References == == Further reading == * ==External links== *Type strain of Nocardiopsis quinghaiensis at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Actinomycetales Category:Bacteria described in 2008
title: Nocardiopsis quinghaiensis
